<h3 align="center">Fitness LIND</h3>

  <p align="center">
    Our site is developed for anyone looking to have access to workout videos and dietary information to help them with their fitness journey. The site allows users to input their data in order to get a recommendation on how they can achieve their dream goal. They have easy access to workout videos of their choice as well as meal plans they can follow along the way. 
    <br />
    <a href="https://github.com/lavanyavirushan/project-1-fitness-lind"><strong>Explore the docs »</strong></a>

<!-- ABOUT THE PROJECT -->

## About The Project

[![Product Name Screen Shot][product-screenshot]](https://lavanyavirushan.github.io/project-1-fitness-lind/)

Everyone over the age of 18 is looking to stay fit and healthy either by losing weight or gaining muscle. We wanted to create a site for users to have all the resource on staying fit physically as well as have easy access to dietary information based on their personal information. If they have workout videos as well as meal plan ideas in one spot, it will help users achieve their goal faster and easier rather then struggling to find different resources along their journey.

<p align="right">(<a href="#readme-top">back to top</a>)</p>

### Built With

- [![tailwindcss][tailwindcss.com]][tailwindcss-url]
- [![JQuery][jquery.com]][jquery-url]
- [![YoutubeAPI][youtube.com]][youtube-url]
- [![APINinjas][apininjas.com]][apininjas-url]
- [![APIEdamam][edamam.com]][edamam-url]

<p align="right">(<a href="#readme-top">back to top</a>)</p>

<!-- GETTING STARTED -->

## Getting Started

### Prerequisites

Make sure to have installed VScode and the Live server extension within VScode installed in order to view the site locally.

- Install VScode [https://code.visualstudio.com](https://code.visualstudio.com/)
- Live server extension [https://marketplace.visualstudio.com](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ritwickdey.LiveServer)

### Installation

1. Get a free API Key at [https://example.com](https://example.com)
2. Clone the repo
   ```sh
   git clone git@github.com:lavanyavirushan/project-1-fitness-lind.git
   ```
3. Start the LiveServer from VScode

4. visit http://localhost[:port]

<p align="right">(<a href="#readme-top">back to top</a>)</p>

<!-- USAGE EXAMPLES -->

## Usage

This project can be used to get customed recommendation on users BMI and AMR. You can checkout various different workouts and their corresponding videos to be able to help user with their fitness journey. Along with workout videos, users may also get customized meal plans on the same site allowing them to have a one stop site that prvides them with all the information to be successfull in their journey to become healthy.

![Product Name Screen Shot][product-screenshot]
![Product Name Screen Shot][product-screenshot-bmi]
![Product Name Screen Shot][product-screenshot-workouts]
![Product Name Screen Shot][product-screenshot-workout-video]

<p align="right">(<a href="#readme-top">back to top</a>)</p>

<!-- CONTRIBUTING -->

## Contributing

If you have a suggestion that would make this better, please fork the repo and create a pull request. You can also simply open an issue with the tag "enhancement".
Don't forget to give the project a star! Thanks again!

1. Fork the Project
2. Create your Feature Branch (`git checkout -b feature/CustomWorkoutEnhancement`)
3. Commit your Changes (`git commit -m 'Add some Custom Workout'`)
4. Push to the Branch (`git push origin feature/CustomWorkoutEnhancement`)
5. Open a Pull Request

<p align="right">(<a href="#readme-top">back to top</a>)</p>
